extendedInfo.description: Chat Heads let you message within any app. You can view incoming message from friends in any app, and reply with a click. It does no matter what app you're already in. checking email, playing games, browsing the web or any other app.When an incoming chat message arrives, a bubble with the picture of the sender and the text appears on the screen with the sender's photo. Tap the photo to open a message window, swipe to remove.MAIN BENEFITS* Incoming messages do not break your flow, they appear whereever you are* Seeing faces instead of names is faster to recognize* The bubble appears long enough and has a large enough text that you can read it (unlike notifications)* When you turn your phone on, you see the last few messagesChat Heads provides similar functionality to Facebook's Chat Heads (not the entire Facebook Home product), but runs on every phone model and supports also non-Facebook messagesCurrent version supports :* Facebook Messenger* SMS* WhatsappWe are working to add support for:* Viber* LineHOW IT WORKSBy using an Android option called "Accessibility Service", this app captures notifications, and checks if it is a chat message. The app draws chat bubbles on top of any running apps. Clicking the chat bubble opens the originating app in the appropriate screen.PERMISSIONSNetwork - Connect to Facebook and download friends imagesWrite external storage - save cache of friends images Draw on other apps - draw the bubble on the running appAccessibility service - Receive incoming notificationsRead Contacts - Resolve phone number to name on incoming SMSReceive SMS - Get notified on incoming SMS messages

reviews.comment: Good try

reviews.title: Had to unistall
reviews.comment: It was giving me some problems with the TalkBack feature of my phone, so I had to unistall. If it wasn\'t for this issue I would definitly keep it. Maybe in the future when improved!

reviews.title: Great App:)
reviews.comment: Instead of going back to the application to reply, can\'t you have a drop down menu where we can reply like in Facebook messenger! Btw, brilliant work man. I was looking for something like this:):) Thank you:)

reviews.title: Seems good but...
reviews.comment: Using samsung galaxy w i8150..the app is running well.but the buble icon are not displayed any picture.only devault icon as a men or women.not like on the demo..will UNINSTALL

reviews.title: Nice work
reviews.comment: This app is nice and light. Would be nice though if it could include more apps like GTalk or other IM as notification :)  Keep up the good work!  And you should check why AVG is stopping it as intrusive adware...

reviews.title: Please update!
reviews.comment: Chat head needs to be smaller, I wish the chat heads don\'t go away in 5seconds! A drop down message should be in the chat heads! Someones name should be shown when you get a message! Able to move chat head around. Please update! Sorry I take away 2 stars!

reviews.title: Very nice app.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do anything but notify you of a message using a different type of notification. When you tap the head it just opens the app associated with the message. Basically it\'s just a second notification bar. I was hoping it would open a smaller quicker messaging tab so you can reply quickly without having to go to a different app than your on.
